Name: Nutrich capsule
Dosage: 2 tablet a day  (for 25 yrs or below patient) 1 tablet a day (for 30 or above yrs patient)
Side Effect: Accidental over dosage may cause:  mild allergic reaction & the burning sensation in the stomach.

Name: Cholecalciferol tablet
Age Restriction: generally no age resriction but avoid to (0 - 12 month) infant
Side Effect: Over dosage of the tablet  may cause: vitamin  D toxicity and more over dosage cause a kidney and  urinary issue.
